amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to restore funding to the National Institute of Food and Agriculture to FY19 levels and directs the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Institute of Food and Agriculture by $157,572,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 323 (Roll no. 410).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 323 (Roll no. 410).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
